description: Google Earth is getting a new feature on the occasion of its 20th anniversary. The 3D interactive map and globe application completed its 20th anniversary on June 10, and to mark the occasion, the Mountain View-based tech giant is adding the historical Street View imagery feature.
title: Google Earth Gets Upgraded With Historical Street View Imagery, AI-Driven Insights to Arrive Soon

description: Lenovo Chromebook Plus has been launched in the US as the first Chromebook with a MediaTek Kompanio Ultra processor and suppot for Google's AI features. It sports a 14-inch OLED screen, a 5-megapixel webcam, and quad speakers with Dolby Atmos. Additionally, the laptop offers Wi-Fi 7 connectivity and is claimed to deliver up to 17 hours of battery life.
title: Lenovo Chromebook Plus With MediaTek Kompanio Ultra 910, Google AI Features and Dolby Atmos Launched
Why Now Is the Time to Upgrade: The End of Windows 10 and the Start of a Safer, Smarter Future

description: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 will be launched on June 26 and just days ahead of the official launch, the company has teased the design and specifications of the phone. It is confirmed to come with a 4.01-inch cover screen and a 6.86-inch flexible panel on the inside. It is confirmed to run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and house a 5,165mAh battery with 50W wireless charging support.
title: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 Design Teased; to Feature Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 5,165mAh Battery

description: CD Project Red has delayed Cyberpunk 2077's Update 2.3. The patch was supposed to launch on June 26. The studio said it needs more time to work on it and claimed the update would be similar in scope to Update 2.2.
title: CD Projekt Red Delays Cyberpunk 2077 Update 2.3, Says Patch Will Similar in Scope to Previous One

description: UK's Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) is proposing to designate Alphabet-owned Google with "strategic market status", it said on Tuesday, giving it more power to intervene in search services to increase innovation and economic growth. The CMA aims to use its expanded power to rein in the power of tech giants such as Google, Apple, Meta and Microsoft without stifling investment or growth.
title: UK May Compel Google to Change Search Rankings, Offer Alternatives

description: Asus has refreshed its gaming laptop lineup in India with the latest Nvidia GeForce RTX 5050 GPU. The ROG G16 now boasts a 14th-gen Intel Core i7, while the TUF Gaming F16 gets a 13th-gen Core i5 CPU. Additionally, the 2024 ROG G16 variant also features the new Nvidia GPU. All three models sport 16-inch displays with up to 240Hz refresh rates and a 90Wh battery.
title: Asus ROG Strix G16, TUF Gaming F16 Refreshed with Nvidia GeForce RTX 5050 GPUs: Price, Specifications

description: Google is now expanding AI Mode in Google Search to India, making it the feature’s first international expansion. The Mountain View-based tech giant first unveiled the artificial intelligence (AI)-based search experience in March to select users in the US, and it was expanded to all US-based users in May at the Google I/O.
title: Google Expands AI Mode in Search to India, Adds Support for Voice and Image Inputs

description: Oppo Pad SE is said to go official in India in July and is likely to be launched alongside the Oppo Reno 14 series. The tablet was launched in select global markets in May with a MediaTek Helio G100 chipset and an 11-inch display with 2K resolution. The Oppo Pad SE has a 9,340mAh battery and supports 33W fast charging.
title: Oppo Pad SE India Launch Timeline Tipped; Could Launch Alongside Reno 14 Series

description: Poco F7 5G with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC and a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit has been launched in India and select global markets. The Indian variant packs a 7,550mAh battery with 90W wired fast charging support. It runs on HyperOS 2.0 and offers several AI features. The Poco F7 5G has a 6,000mm sq vapour cooling chamber, a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, and a dual stereo speaker system.
title: Poco F7 5G With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, 7,550mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung is set to unveil new Galaxy devices on July 9 at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event. Ahead of the launch, pre-reservations for the products have begun in India with a refundable Rs. 2,000 token. Customers who pre-reserve the upcoming devices are eligible for early delivery and benefits worth up to Rs. 5,999. Expected launches include the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, Galaxy Buds Core, and Galaxy Watch 8 series.
title: Samsung Opens Pre-Reservations for Upcoming Galaxy Z Foldables in India

description: NASA has officially postponed the launch of Axiom Mission 4 due to operational concerns. Now set for June 25, 2025, the mission is historic for India, Poland, and Hungary. It will send astronauts, including India's Shubhanshu Shukla, to the ISS for a 14-day scientific expedition.
title: Axiom 4 Mission Rescheduled to June 25, NASA Confirms New Launch Plan

description: Azadi, a Malayalam thriller featuring a tense hospital jailbreak plot, is set for digital release. The Tamil-dubbed version will stream soon on Sun NXT. Starring Sreenath Bhasi and Raveena Ravi, the film combines emotional drama, revenge, and high-stakes action into a powerful narrative.
title: Azadi OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Malayalam Thriller Online?

description: Check out the full list of cheat codes for the popular Indian Bike Driving 3D game.
title: Indian Bike Driving 3D Cheat Codes (June 2025): Check out Full List of Cheats for this Popular Game

description: Apple recently released the iOS 26 Beta 2 update for iPhone with several new features and fixes for bugs in tow. As per a report, delving into the update’s code has revealed a reference towards the screen resolution of an unreleased iPhone. It reportedly indicates the existence of the iPhone 17 Air, a new model that is expected to sit between the iPhone 17 Pro and the Pro Max handsets.
title: iOS 26 Beta 2 Code Reportedly Provides First Confirmation of iPhone 17 Air

description: Viewers' favorite Political drama, Panchayat Season 4, is finally back and is now streaming on Prime Video. This season, the plot revolves around Pradhan Ji’s and Bhushan’s election battle, where they both give it all to win the title. What’s the fate of Phulera? Watch Now.
title: Panchayat Season 4 Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video:  Know Everything About Plot, Cast, Streaming, and More

description: Written and directed by Raj Kumar Gupta, Raid 2 is a political thriller movie starring Ajay Devgan in the lead role. The plot revolves around an IPS officer, who raids a political figure at Bhoj, to expose his hidden truths. Will he be able to succeed, or will the power win? Streaming soon.
title: Raid 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Ajay Devgn Starrer Political Thriller Drama Online?

description: Realme GT 8 Pro is likely to be launched later this year. As per a tipster, Realme's 2025 flagship could sport a 6.85-inch LTPO 2K display that is said to feature an anti-glare coating and narrow edges. The phone is rumoured to feature the unannounced Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 SoC.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Tipped to Sport an Anti-Glare Screen With 2K Resolution

description: The Verdict is a Tamil-language courtroom thriller directed by Krishna Sankar. The film, now streaming on Sun NXT, features a murder mystery involving betrayal and psychological twists. With strong performances by Sruthi Hariharan and Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, it promises suspense, emotional drama, and gripping storytelling.
title: The Verdict OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Tamil Courtroom Thriller Online?

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale date has been announced, and the sale event will offer significant discounts across a wide range of electronics, including smartphones, laptops, and smart TVs, along with home appliances. Shoppers can also expect exclusive bank offers, potentially slashing an additional 10 percent off the cost of their purchases.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale Dates Announced: Discounts on Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, OnePlus 13s Teased

description: Dune: Awakening has sold a million copies since it launched on PC on June 10, developer Funcom has announced. The survival game is one of the most played titles on Steam right now.
title: Dune: Awakening Sells One Millon Copies in Two Weeks, Becoming Funcom's Fastest-Selling Title Ever

description: Nothing Headphone 1 are all set to go official as the company's first over-the-ear headphones. Ahead of the July 1 launch date, they have leaked online. They appear to be similar to AirPods Max with a transparent aesthetic. They appear to have a USB Type-C port and a 3.5mm audio jack.
title: Nothing Headphone 1 Leaked in Video, Showcases Translucent Design Elements

description: OnePlus Nord 5 will be equipped with a dual rear camera unit, including a 50-megapixel main rear sensor and an 8-megapixel ultrawide shooter. The handset will feature a 50-megapixel selfie snapper as well. Meanwhile, the OnePlus Buds 4 will support up to 55dB adaptive ANC and up to 47ms ultra-low latency.
title: OnePlus Nord 5 Camera Details Revealed Ahead of July 8 Launch; Buds 4 to Offer Up to 55dB ANC

description: Tesla deployed a small group of self-driving taxis picking up paying passengers on Sunday in Austin, Texas. The event marked the first time Tesla cars without human drivers have carried paying riders, a business that Musk sees as crucial to the electric car maker's financial future.
title: Tesla Rolls out Robotaxis in Texas Test

description: Australia’s eSafety Commissioner, Julie Inman Grant, called on the government to reverse its controversial exemption for YouTube from a social media ban for under-16s. In a blog post, YouTube said Inman Grant’s comments ignored the benefits YouTube offered to school students and teachers.
title: YouTube Exemption From Australian Teen Social Media Ban Opposed by Regulator

description: Microsoft introduced Mu, a new artificial intelligence (AI) model that can run locally on a device, on Monday. Last week, the Redmond-based tech giant released new Windows 11 features in beta, among which was the new AI agents feature in Settings. The feature allows users to describe what they want to do in the Settings menu, and uses AI agents to either navigate to the option or autonomously perform the action.
title: Microsoft Introduces Mu AI Model Which Powers AI Agents in Windows 11 Settings

description: Microsoft's Xbox PC app will get significant upgrade later this year, with an aggregated gaming library. This update will roll out to testers soon and unify access to games installed from "leading PC store fronts." This enhancement follows the launch of Asus's Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X handhelds, earlier this month.
title: Microsoft's Xbox PC App Gets Aggregated Gaming Library With Access to Titles From Third Party Stores

description: Tecno Spark Go 2 has been launched in India with a 5,000mAh battery, a 13-megapixel main rear camera, and a 120Hz LCD screen. The handset will be available via Flipkart starting July 1 at Rs. 6,999 for the sole 4GB + 64GB option. It is claimed to allow users to make calls without network support with Tecno's Free Link App.
title: Tecno Spark Go 2 With 5,000mAh Battery, Free Link App Support Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Visual Supply Company, popularly known as VSCO, is said to be gearing up to launch a dedicated camera app for the iPhone. Dubbed Capture, the app will initially only be available on iOS as a third-party alternative to the built-in Camera app, as per a report. It may let users choose between various film-style presets which can be applied before capturing a photo. VSCO is expected to launch the Capture app soon in select markets including Australia and New Zealand.
title: VSCO to Launch Capture, a Dedicated Camera App for iPhone With Film-Style Presets: Report

description: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold will reportedly feature a slimmer hinge, narrow bezels and a slightly bigger cover display. It is said to come with IP68 dust and water resistance. The foldable is likely to be launched in August alongside other Pixel 10 series siblings.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold to Features a Slimmer Hinge, IP68 Rating: Report

description: MindsEye developer Build a Rocket Boy has confirmed it has begun a consultation process that may lead to some layoffs. The studio did not specify the number of employees who will be impacted by the move.
title: MindsEye Developer Build a Rocket Boy Confirms It Has Started Layoff Process

description: iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max models could offer significantly improved thermal management, thanks to a new vapour chamber (VC) cooling system. Leaked information suggests Apple is making these hardware adjustments due to its new A19 Pro chip. It could boost the smartphones' overall thermal efficiency, enabling better performance during intensive tasks.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Tipped to Feature Vapour Chamber Cooling System for Improved Heat Management

description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and former Apple designer Jony Ive’s hardware company is reportedly not building a wearable device. On Sunday, the company removed its “io” branding from everywhere due to a trademark lawsuit. Now, as per the report, court filings for the suit have revealed that the artificial intelligence (AI) device in the works is not a wearable.
title: OpenAI and Jony Ive’s Under-Development AI Device Is Reportedly Not a Wearable

description: With Samsung officially announcing the date for its Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event, new renders of the upcoming Galaxy Watch 8 series have surfaced, hinting at the major design overhaul expected this year. The lineup is likely to include three models — Galaxy Watch 8, Watch 8 Classic, and Watch Ultra (2025) — all reportedly featuring a new squircle-shaped design inspired by the previous Galaxy Watch Ultra. The Classic and Ultra versions are also said to include an additional “Quick Button” for enhanced functionality.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Series Renders Surface Ahead of Galaxy Unpacked; Squircle Design Showcased

description: Vivo T4 Lite 5G has been launched in India with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, a 6,000mAh battery and an IP64 dust and splash-resistant build. The handset is equipped with a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit, a 5-megapixel selfie shooter and a 6.74-inch display. It ships with Android 15-based FuntouchOS 15 and gets AI-backed tools like AI Photo Enhance and AI Erase.
title: Vivo T4 Lite 5G With 50-Megapixel Rear Camera, 6,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Apple is expected to increase the display size of the standard iPhone 17 this year to match the size of the iPhone 17 Pro. Case maker Spigen has allegedly listed its new screen protection on Amazon, suggesting the display upgrade. The iPhone 17 is expected to come with a 6.3-inch screen, compared to the 6.1-inch display of last year's standard iPhone 16.
title: iPhone 17 Display Size Leaked by Case Manufacturer; Suggests Major Upgrade

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 were reportedly spotted on an Italian online retail website, where they were listed with their prices. The book-style foldable Fold 7 could be priced at EUR 2,227.71 (roughly Rs. 2,23,000) and EUR 2,309.03 (roughly Rs. 2,31,100) for the 256GB and 512GB variants, while the clamshell Flip 7 model could cost EUR 1,425.51 (roughly Rs. 1,43,000) for the 512GB option.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 Prices Leaked Ahead of July 9 Launch

description: Apple has released iOS 26 Beta 2 for iPhone. The update brings a handful of changes over the Beta 1 update that was introduced shortly after WWDC 2025. It adds a new option to increase the blur when displaying the Control Centre, improving legibility. Meanwhile, the iOS 26 Beta 2 update also carries fixes for several issues, including an instance where iPhone 16 models failed to boot up after installing the first beta.
title: iOS 26 Beta 2 Update for iPhone With More Blur in Control Centre, Bug Fixes Rolling Out

description: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z3 sports a familiar design but misses out on Active Noise Cancellation (ANC), which means we may see another version with it soon. At under Rs. 2,000, the Z3 offers a balanced audio output, but you should not expect a lot from it. It's fantastic for calls, and the battery life is impressive on this one. The fast-charging support is a welcome addition.
title: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z3 Review: Proof That Good Never Goes Out of Style

description: Samsung has announced the date for its next Galaxy Unpacked event. At the biannual showcase, the company is expected to take the wraps off its latest generation of foldable smartphones — the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Galaxy Z Flip 7. Alongside, we could also see the debut of the Galaxy Watch 8 series, Galaxy Z Flip FE as well as the recently teased Galaxy Buds Core.
title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Event Set for July 9; Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 to Be Unveiled

description: After using the JBL Tune Beam 2 for more than a month, I feel these earphones are good enough to be the daily driver of anyone who likes a bass-heavy experience without compromising on mids and vocals. At a price of Rs. 5,499, it offers a better audio experience compared to its competitors.
title: JBL Tune Beam 2 Review: Punchy Sound Meets Powerful ANC
